content: this is the first pattern i ever wrote as such the instructions are a bit vague feel free to pm me with any questions this goes for any of my patterns this pattern uses two strands held together throughout one strand yarn a remains constant while the other strand varies between a second strand of yarn a a solid contrast color yarn b and a novelty yarn yarn c i have a fat funky monkey variation that i will eventually write up and post d this pattern is available free you may make as many as you want for sale online or offline or for charity use as long as you attribute it to me and provide the link to the pattern with each item you sell groups of items sold to the same customer only need one attribution statement per order i do ask that you please pm or email me if you are selling it
